Hero.headline: Connecting Potential. Building Nations.
Hero.subHeadline: Leading migrant workforce management innovation with advanced FinTech and Logistics across ASEAN.

Vision.content1: From remote villages in Phongsaly to global production lines in Rayong... V-Group creates a 'Green Lane' reducing bureaucracy, combined with FinTech allowing access to good jobs without initial capital.
Vision.content2: We don't just deliver labor; we deliver 'Standards' through V-Academy and 100% Traceability systems.

vwork.desc: Comprehensive MOU labor supply with Payroll Management system.

vcare.desc: Premium maids, nannies, and elderly care trained in Luxury Living.

vconnect.desc: Largest local recruitment network in Laos covering 148 districts.

wallet.desc: Digital wallet for workers reducing cash usage, transparent and auditable.

biometric.desc: Identity verification via face and fingerprint to prevent impersonation.

policy.title: No Recruitment Fee Policy

community.title: Community Development
